Zoer just dropped its biggest update yet â€” and itâ€™s honestly one of the most powerful AI full-stack engineering tools on the market right now.
This new Agentic AI upgrade transforms Zoer from a simple code generator into a full engineering team that handles everything for you: database, backend, auth, Stripe payments, deployments, and even AI image generation with Nanobanana.

In this video, I break down all the NEW features, show you how Zoer builds apps end-to-end, and walk through a full demo including:
âœ… Database-first architecture
âœ… Automatic authentication (Google + Email/Password)
âœ… Built-in user management
âœ… Integrated Stripe payments (test + live setup)
âœ… Nanobanana AI model for text-to-image & image-to-image
âœ… Fully wired backend + frontend
âœ… Automatic deployment in minutes

Whether you're using Cursor, Lovable, Replit, or any other AI coding tool â€” Zoer is easily becoming one of the best alternatives for building real products insanely fast.

ğŸ”¥ What Youâ€™ll Learn
â€¢ How Zoer works as an AI Full-Stack Engineer
â€¢ How agentic generation builds backend + frontend automatically
â€¢ How to set up login systems with no configuration
â€¢ How to integrate payments in under 3 minutes
â€¢ How Zoer replaces tools like Supabase, Netlify, and image APIs
â€¢ Real-time preview and deployment workflow
